name: Front Page Advantage
description:
Established in 2006 and based in Basingstoke we work with over 60 clients throughout the UK, offering a friendly and dedicated service. We have a team of 6 digital specialists who are passionate and determined to help you realise your online potential. We work with a combination of B2B and B2C companies across 29 market sectors. We have the experience to understand your business, define your customers and deliver to you a measurable ROI.
We have built long lasting relationships with clients, with an average client lifetime of over 2 years with most of our new clients coming from existing customer recommendations. We work as your trusted adviser, providing honest advice and setting realistic expectations to achieve the best return on your investment. We are proud to be a long standing Google Partner and have been selected by Google as an “Elevator” agency due to our dedication to the paid search arena. Access to training and support from Google give us a significant advantage over other agencies.
